title: Which is a better value deal in 2020, the iPhone 12 or the iPhone 11? Should you pay more in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both the iPhone 11 and 12 are nearly same but there are some changes like 5g compatible, latest hardware A14 bionic chipset's and new design.Apple says that the iphone 12 is 50% faster than the iPhone 11 but in real life the performance of both these devices is same. When it comes to pricing the iPhone 12 is costlier than the iPhone 11.approximately both the devices cost varies around 20k. If you want to get lastet hardware with 5g and you are ok to pay extra money then you can buy the iPhone 12.Where as you want to save some bucks and buy iPhone 11 it's your choice also if you save money by buying an iPhone 11 with that saved money you can buy apple airpods which will a better option with lower price.

If you are willing to settle for an older generation device the iPhone 11 is value for money. It has all the necessary features along with good cameras and fantastic battery life. However, the iPhone 12 has Apple’s latest A14 bionic chipset and a completely new design along with updated hardware. The new MagSafe dock is great while wireless charging and clips on accessories as well. Currently there are many offers going on the iPhone 11 and you can get one at a very good price.
